product_name: Mountainsmith Kit Cube Traveler Camera Case
long_description: Insert the Mountainsmith Kit Cube Traveler camera case into your carry-on bag or pack to convert it into a padded, protective camera hauler for commuting, travel and backcountry adventures.
short_description: Insert the Mountainsmith Kit Cube Traveler camera case into your carry-on bag or pack to convert it into a padded, protective camera hauler for commuting, travel and backcountry adventures.
